history.proof: intros z H. destruct H as [k Hk]. qsimpl use: Zodd_def1. sauto lq: on dep: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment z, k : Z Hk : z = 2 * k + 1 Unable to unify "exists k : Z, ?M1842 = 2 * k + 1" with "match z with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => False | _ => True end".
The reference k was not found in the current environment.

original: intros z H. destruct H as [k Hk]. apply Zodd_def1. exists k. apply Hk.
